1.Dad, Happy Birthday! No matter what, I’ll always be your number one fan!Wishing you another year that rocks! 

2. Happy Birthday. Thank you for always being there to lend a helping hand. I hope today brings you lots of love, happiness, and smiles, Dad! 

3. I feel truly lucky to have such a loving, caring and encouraging father. Wishing you an entirely peaceful day, full of pleasant and joyful moments! 

4. Thanks for making all the sacrifices silently and working hard all day and night just to get us a better life, you are one of the most important persons in my life! I love you, happy birthday dad! 

5. I knew that you were my secret Santa every time but I kept on pretending that I didn’t know who it was to keep all my wishes coming true! Happy birthday dear father! 

6. Happiest birthday to the most handsome and kindhearted man that I have ever known! I always wanted to grow up to be somebody like you. You made me believe that this world is beautiful! 

7. Happy birthday to the adorable dad who will loosen his pockets and tighten his hugs for me just with a small tug.
